name: Tao Chou
story: Tao Meng grew up in a small village in rural China. Always interested in military strategy and tactics, he joined the Chinese People's Liberation Army as soon as he was of age. After several years of service and numerous commendations, he was selected for a special forces unit that would later be deployed to Takistan. Tao Meng quickly distinguished himself as a natural leader and was eventually promoted to Squad Leader. Despite the intense combat and grueling conditions, Tao Meng remains focused on his mission and the safety of his squad.
